data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Haa, Bhutan need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Haa, Bhutan
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Haa, Bhutan by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 507 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, give faith and responsive hearts to the 13,700 citizens of the the state of Haa.
data.verse: Seek the Lord while he may be found; call upon him while he is near.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 27 believers in the state of Haa with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Bania people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Haa a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Haa.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Haa who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

location.name: Haa
location.people_groups_list: Walang, Kachari Sonwal, Brahmin, Broq-Pa, Darjee
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Walang (2,100), Kachari Sonwal (1,100), Brahmin (6,100), Broq-Pa (5,600), Darjee (1,900)
